unnormalised: Urban planning in India needs more focus on sustainable development. Think smart cities, not just concrete jungles! The Charles Correa Foundation's work is inspiring. Remember the chaotic Mumbai in "Slumdog Millionaire"? We need better infrastructure and affordable housing, like the Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana, for all, not just flyovers costing Rs. 1000 crore/km.
